name: locus
description: Your center point for planning and building projects with AI. Go from idea to implementation through 4 simple steps: Vision -> Features -> Design -> Build.
long_description:
Locus provides a comprehensive skills framework for AI-powered project planning. It includes:

- 46 specialized skills covering executive strategy, product management, engineering leadership, and developer specializations
- 14 agent definitions for specialized perspectives
- Automatic skill loading and discovery
- Simple 4-step project planning workflow

Perfect for:
- Starting new projects from scratch
- Getting diverse perspectives on technical decisions
- Following proven development workflows
- Organizing complex multi-step implementations
author: swiggityswerve
